Class BinaryHeap<R>

  • java.lang.Object
    • BinaryTree<R>
      • BinaryHeap<R>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<R>, Queue<R>

    public class BinaryHeap<R>
extends BinaryTree<R>
implements Queue<R>
    HW06 for Gebze Technical University BinaryHeap class extends binary tree to store data's inside and implements queue interface to have a priority queue like structure
    Author:
    Deniz Can Erdem YÄ±lmaz - 151044001 20.04.2017.
